column5: I know Remi and Christine are retiring. Just curious if this is final year, and if there are any more reports on new owners, and what all camps they may run. Thanks in advance for any info.
Aren't they only running Kayedon currently? I think the other camps have already been sold off. Although, I am not sure what happened to Makoki though.
Last I knew was melchette and kayedon. Just wasn't sure if they still had hand in either or both.
https://www.borealforestoutfitters.com/ has Melchett. I don't know what level of involvement they still have in it's operation.

Sue and Jason are running Melchett this year with Kayedon coming next year. Many improvements to Melchett this year. For a few --cabin painted, solar lights, and new dock. More to come and then Kayedon.

We met Jason & Sue and there newborn going into and coming out ofKayedon June 2017. They are going to be great owners. They were there to introduce themselves on the way in. She flew us in 2 years ago. They wanted to know how they could improve the camp going forward. We look forward to our next return trip in 2019.
